sentences.sContent: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.sCn: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.sContent: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.sCn: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.sContent: They all want to come to the wedding.

trans.tranOther: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about
